channel.title: Project Asterux [PLEASE KEEP THIS TOPIC ALIVE!]
channel.description:
[ul][center][u]Project Asterux![/u][/center]
*Update*If you know how to code full fishing or herblore, please do tell me ill give the credit to you when the source is finished, and other stuff to which i'll discuss outside mopar.
[center][b][u]Thank you's and applauds[/b][/center]
[center]I'd first off like to thank Kihomura for one; the base im using (It was his blank source) and for two; just inspiring me i like his stuff that he does and im interested in it to, thanks man. And also The Reaper he was one of the first GOOD sources i liked, i enjoyed it and it got me into coding sources and it made me try and improve, (Even though the slightest improvements is good for me haha). I would also like to thank some of the posters on here for encouraging me to carry on and for the help, thanks guys! :D[/center]
[center][b][u]More info[/b][/center]
[center][b]I'm gonna try and base this mainly on pking and mini-games. if i cant find anything for herblore or fishing ill leave the skilling stuff out the server.[/center][/b]
[center]Things i want added :
[list] [li]Skilling area[/li] [li][s]A few various pking area's[/s][/li] [li][s]More commands[/s][/li] [li]Full Magic[/li] [li]Full Ancients and maybe lunar if i get better[/li] [li]Full fishing and herblore[/li] [li]Veng[/li] [li][s]Player faces to be fixed (Where the beards dont show)[/s][/li] [li][s]Have safe zones added (Pretty much the whole area is pk world :P)[/s][/li] [li][s]Have some more silab items added in[/s][/li] [li]Admin zone[/li] [li]Shops[/li] [li]Jad & maybe kq...[/li] [li]Barrows, hopefully like runescapes version[/li] [li][s]Make ::noclip ban you if used[/s][/li] [li]A tad slower exp rate[/li] [li]Realistic slayer[/li] [li]Full Alching[/li] [li]Realistic spec for d bow and mage bow[/li][li] [/li][li]Hoepfully full prayer[/li][/list] [list] [/list]
Just remember i using a blank source as a base, so many things that all common servers have i will not..[/center]
[center]Now for some pictures... [img]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo127/forumsiggys_2008/lolers4.jpg[/img] This has been updated as of 17/1/09, i added the altar and a gnome saying "pking bar" Not loads has been added but its a start, im planning on adding some giant rat's behind the altar with some fairly decent drops, for beginners and then they can move onto the training area.
[img]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo127/forumsiggys_2008/lolers2.jpg[/img] I'm aiming for a few more NPC's so theres more monster's to fight, i also need to add the drops for them, thats what seems to confuse me atm.. :S
[img]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo127/forumsiggys_2008/lolers5.jpg[/img] Updated 17/1/09, this is a kick-ass pking area its great :D
[img]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo127/forumsiggys_2008/lolers6.jpg[/img] A new unique Jad game, i haven't seen this done before, this aimed mainly for teams, but if you got big enough balls to solo it then good luck its your funeral lol, now all i gotta do is add KQ and her cronies ;D
Thanks guys for your interest, when finished this WILL be realeased here and here only, if you have anything you'd like to share or for me to add to the server my msn is the best way ben_frowen_2008@hotmail.com .[/center][/ul]

item.title: Project Asterux [PLEASE KEEP THIS TOPIC ALIVE!]
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

You should use a Devolution base 8. It has perfect ranging AND mage, it is a pretty blank source though. If I was still into Silab servers, Devo would DEFINETLY be my base. It looks pretty sweet in my opinion!

Read full topic
item.source: Project Asterux [PLEASE KEEP THIS TOPIC ALIVE!]

item.title: Project Asterux [PLEASE KEEP THIS TOPIC ALIVE!]
item.dc:creator: @benscape benscape
item.description:
@benscape wrote:

[quote=“King Redrum, post:7, topic:256786”]Don’t give up, ben. People may not like it now but that doesn’t mean they won’t like it later on. I for one, don’t like servers like this, but that’s just me, but I won’t hold that against anyone who makes one like this.

Keep up the work, make it better, learn, screw around and have fun mainly, that’s what programming/coding is all about to me, to have fun.[/quote]
Ok i wont, thank you so much for the nice comment guys.

Shrogg : Im using Kihomura’s blank server source.
Anfernio : Thank you for the no-clip command and yes ill add you on msn. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2009, 06:34:11 am[/size][hr]More updates have been added please have a look ;D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2009, 10:13:29 am[/size][hr]More updates keep checking my list[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2009, 01:26:23 pm[/size][hr]More has been added please look![br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2009, 05:07:17 pm[/size][hr]Jad mini has been added come on keep this topic alive

Read full topic

item.title: Project Asterux [PLEASE KEEP THIS TOPIC ALIVE!]
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

Don’t give up, ben. People may not like it now but that doesn’t mean they won’t like it later on. I for one, don’t like servers like this, but that’s just me, but I won’t hold that against anyone who makes one like this.

Keep up the work, make it better, learn, screw around and have fun mainly, that’s what programming/coding is all about to me, to have fun.

Don’t give up, make it better.
Just because people don’t like it now, what makes you think they won’t later on.

And maybe you should think about switching bases…

@benscape wrote:

[ul][center]Project Asterux![/center]

UpdateIf you know how to code full fishing or herblore, please do tell me ill give the credit to you when the source is finished, and other stuff to which i’ll discuss outside mopar.

[center][u]Thank you’s and applauds[/center]

[center]I’d first off like to thank Kihomura for one; the base im using (It was his blank source) and for two; just inspiring me i like his stuff that he does and im interested in it to, thanks man. And also The Reaper he was one of the first GOOD sources i liked, i enjoyed it and it got me into coding sources and it made me try and improve, (Even though the slightest improvements is good for me haha). I would also like to thank some of the posters on here for encouraging me to carry on and for the help, thanks guys! :D[/center]

[center][u]More info[/center]

[center]I’m gonna try and base this mainly on pking and mini-games. if i cant find anything for herblore or fishing ill leave the skilling stuff out the server.[/center]

[center]Things i want added :

[list]
[li]Skilling area[/li]
[li]A few various pking area’s[/li]
[li]More commands[/li]
[li]Full Magic[/li]
[li]Full Ancients and maybe lunar if i get better[/li]
[li]Full fishing and herblore[/li]
[li]Veng[/li]
[li]Player faces to be fixed (Where the beards dont show)[/li]
[li]Have safe zones added (Pretty much the whole area is pk world :P)[/li]
[li]Have some more silab items added in[/li]
[li]Admin zone[/li]
[li]Shops[/li]
[li]Jad & maybe kq…[/li]
[li]Barrows, hopefully like runescapes version[/li]

[li]Realistic slayer[/li]
[li]Full Alching[/li]
[li]Realistic spec for d bow and mage bow[/li][li]
[/li][li]Hoepfully full prayer[/li][/list]
[list]
[/list]

Just remember i using a blank source as a base, so many things that all common servers have i will not…[/center]

[center]Now for some pictures…

This has been updated as of 17/1/09, i added the altar and a gnome saying “pking bar” Not loads has been added but its a start, im planning on adding some giant rat’s behind the altar with some fairly decent drops, for beginners and then they can move onto the training area.


I’m aiming for a few more NPC’s so theres more monster’s to fight, i also need to add the drops for them, thats what seems to confuse me atm… :S


Updated 17/1/09, this is a kick-ass pking area its great


A new unique Jad game, i haven’t seen this done before, this aimed mainly for teams, but if you got big enough balls to solo it then good luck its your funeral lol, now all i gotta do is add KQ and her cronies ;D

Thanks guys for your interest, when finished this WILL be realeased here and here only, if you have anything you’d like to share or for me to add to the server my msn is the best way ben_frowen_2008@hotmail.com .[/center][/ul]
